ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)
2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into strips
1 cup liquid egg substitute (such as Egg Beaters®)

cookingTips: Marinate chicken in spiced buttermilk mixture for at least 2 hours for tender, flavorful strips
Coat with panko after dipping in egg substitute for crispy exterior
Bake at 400°F for 15-20 minutes until golden and cooked through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user achieve crispy, healthy baked strips with spicy flavor and tender, moist chicken inside.
